mapper.select: select r.* from users u inner join user_roles ur on u.login_id = ur.login_id inner join roles r on ur.role_id = r.id where u.login_id = #{loginid};

select count(1) from permissions p inner join role_permissions rp on p.id = rp.permission_id inner join user_roles ur on rp.role_id = ur.role_id where ur.login_id = #{loginid} and p.code = #{permissionCode};
